text: Hungry Eyes is a song recorded by American singer Eric Carmen. It was featured in 1987 movie Dirty Dancing. The song peaked at number four on the US Hot 100 and number two on the Adult Contemporary Tracks. The song is a rock ballad and has been covered by many artists worldwide. Category:1987 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Pop rock songs Category:Torch songs
title: Hungry Eyes
